com.project.ardrone_android_geii

Class DroneManager_OpenCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.ardrone_android_geii.DroneManager
      • com.project.ardrone_android_geii.DroneManager_OpenCV

  • public class DroneManager_OpenCV
extends DroneManager
    Class derived from DroneManager to enable OpenCV features on the application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) ThreadsManager_OpenCV mThreadsCV

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void atterissage()
      This function stops the steering threads using a boolean, it stops the timer and starts the Atterissage and Watchdog threads (the emergency landing function is the same, only the thread and thus the associated command change).
      void decollage()
      This function resets the variables (chronometer sequence, flight’s Boolean ..) and then start Piloting threads, which use EnvoiTrameUDP() function to send the AT command.

      • Methods inherited from class com.project.ardrone_android_geii.DroneManager

        AttenteMs, CreationSocketPacket, emergency, EnvoiTrameUDP, IncrementSeq

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
